alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 6:42PM CST until December 09 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA AND EAST CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES... At 642 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairview, or 7 miles north of Fulton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Fulton, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Mantachie, Skyline, Unity, Mooreville, Indian Hills, Dorsey, Eggville, and Ballardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
